TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {26320=Incorporated on 04/1889, 7475=According to our research of Connecticut and other state lists there were 35 registered sex offenders living in Ansonia, Connecticut as of July 29, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Ansonia to the number of sex offenders is 529 to 1. The number of registered sex offenders compared to the number of residents in this city is near the state average.}
